title: 1974 - Gold - Roger Moore - Can one man stop a billion-dollar disaster?

sources.title: 1974 - Gold - Roger Moore - Can one man stop a billion-dollar disaster?
sources.description:
Golden greed turns deadly! A flooded mine, a corporate conspiracy, and one man's race to save thousands trapped underground.
New mine manager Rod Slater uncovers a plot by financiers to flood his South African gold mine and manipulate global prices. When disaster strikes, Slater and miner Big King battle rising waters to detonate a safety charge that could save livesâ€”or bury them forever.

Original Title: Gold (1974) | AKA: The Great Gold Conspiracy
